titles.title: Designating the caucus room in the Cannon House Office Building as the "Speaker Nancy Pelosi Caucus Room".
Designating the caucus room in the Cannon House Office Building as the "Speaker Nancy Pelosi Caucus Room".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

vote.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1499, H. Res. 1495 is considered passed House.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary: This resolution designates the caucus room in the Cannon House Office Building (room 390) as the Speaker Nancy Pelosi Caucus Room.
